deployerVersion.description:
Deploy the xsl file generated by the facetmap generator into the webapp folder.
After deployment you need refresh the Alfresco's webscripts (http://myalfresco:8080/alfresco/webscripts/-> Refresh webscripts) and update the facetmap.

configurationParameter.documentation: The name of the webapp in which there are the facets.
configurationParameter.label: FacetFacets webapp

configurationParameter.documentation: The name of the webapp in which there are the content.
configurationParameter.label: FacetContent webapp

configurationParameter.documentation:
Set this value to the Alfresco Tomcat directory path in order the deployer puts the packaged war file.
This option is mandatory.
configurationParameter.label: Tomcat installation directory
